milestone.description: Provide new collector restful service,  topological graph of application clusters. And upgrade the distributed trace view.

title: TraceSegment serialization in JSON format.
body:
- Use gson replace protobuf in serialization. 
- Build as small json as possible.(not finished yet.)

ref https://github.com/wu-sheng/sky-walking/wiki/3.0-Collector-TraceSegment-in-JSON-format

title: Merge the 3.0-preview
body:
- Based on akka cluster mechanism. (No ClusterRegion in 3.0)
- New trace data construction. Use `SegmentRef` instead of `levelId-ref`

title: Add collector modules to 3.0
body:
* Add two modules, `collector-cluster` and `collector-worker`
* Bring `Akka` as core cluster interactive tech.

milestone.description: Provide new collector restful service,  topological graph of application clusters. And upgrade the distributed trace view.

* release a version following OpenTracing.io
* provide bridge mode lib to integrate data of system and tracer
* provide English doc as default on Wiki

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Something isn't working and you are sure it's a bug!

milestone.description:
* not dependency on Hadoop or HBase, easy to deploy or maintenance
* support simple-cluster mode
* support docker mode in single-server-instance
* support more plugins
   * motan rpc framework (provided)
* support log framework(log4j, log4j2, logback) to output traceid in system log.

title: merge feature/disruptor test
body:
* Use **disruptor** to replace **DataCarrier** improve performance
* Provide 20,000+ tps per storage node, only use SATA

title: Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md
body:
### wu-sheng/sky-walking now has a Chat Room on Gitter

@wu-sheng has just created a chat room. You can visit it here: [https://gitter.im/sky-walking/Lobby](https://gitter.im/sky-walking/Lobby?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&content=body_link).

This pull-request adds this badge to your README.md:


[![Gitter](https://badges.gitter.im/sky-walking/Lobby.svg)](https://gitter.im/sky-walking/Lobby?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=body_badge)

If my aim is a little off, please [let me know](https://github.com/gitterHQ/readme-badger/issues).

Happy chatting.


PS: [Click here](https://gitter.im/settings/badger/opt-out) if you would prefer not to receive automatic pull-requests from Gitter in future.

title: skyWalking修改记录.md
body:
一、pom修改
1. dubbox  改为 dubbo
2. 父pom 增加模块 skywalking-log
<module>samples/skywalking-example</module>
3. 去掉内部仓库
http://10.1.228.199:18081/nexus/content/groups/public/
改为 http://maven.glodon.com/nexus/content/groups/public/
4.去掉  jmxri、jmxtools
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.zookeeper</groupId>
    <artifactId>zookeeper</artifactId>
    <version>3.4.0</version>
    <exclusions>
        <exclusion>
            <artifactId>jmxri</artifactId>
            <groupId>com.sun.jmx</groupId>
        </exclusion>
        <exclusion>
            <artifactId>jmxtools</artifactId>
            <groupId>com.sun.jdmk</groupId>
        </exclusion>
    </exclusions>
</dependency>

repo.name: sky-walking
repo.description: Large-Scale Distributed Systems Tracing Infrastructure /  APM，support popular rpc framework(such as dubbo, dubbox, etc.), provide simple and high-efficiency api to trace rpc in distributed cluster, and analysis system performance.
